title: Mini YOLO UAV
description: Lightweight object detection on UAV footage with a tiny YOLO variant; tuned for CPU-only inference.
readme:
# Mini YOLO UAV

A compact object detector optimized for UAV video.

## Features
- Tiny model, fast on CPU
- Simple dataset loader
- ONNX export

## Quickstart
```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
python infer.py --video sample.mp4
```

title: THUCNews Linear SVM
description: Classic text classification baseline on THUCNews using TF-IDF + Linear SVM.
readme:
# THUCNews Linear SVM

A clean, reproducible baseline.

## Train
```bash
python train.py
```
## Eval
```bash
python eval.py
```
